short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search the Ann Arbor District Libraries catalog and more by highlighted text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AADL Speedy Search is a powerful and convenient Chrome extension that allows you to quickly search the Ann Arbor District Library (AADL) catalog and Goodreads directly from your browser. With just a simple right-click on any highlighted text, you can initiate a search and find the books, resources, or reviews you need in seconds.
Key Features:

Instant Search: Highlight any text on a webpage, right-click, and select "Search AADL for '...'" or "Search Good Reads for '...'" to instantly search for the selected text in the respective platform.

AADL Catalog Search: Easily search through the extensive collection of the Ann Arbor District Library, including books, audiobooks, movies, music, and more. Find availability, item details, and place holds directly from the search results.

Goodreads Integration: Explore book reviews, ratings, and recommendations from the world's largest community of readers. Discover new titles, authors, and connect with like-minded book enthusiasts.

Time-saving: No more copying and pasting search terms or navigating to separate websites. AADL Speedy Search streamlines your research and book discovery process, saving you valuable time.

Easy to Use: With a clean and intuitive interface, AADL Speedy Search is simple to install and use. No complicated setup or configuration required.

Whether you're a student, researcher, or avid reader, AADL Speedy Search is an essential tool for anyone who frequently uses the Ann Arbor District Library or Goodreads. Boost your productivity and enhance your reading experience with this powerful Chrome extension today!
